text:
Hello,
I
would like to apply for a scholarship because i want integrate my
school of dream: Australian national university.
When
I was little, I moved in Paris so i would like to study in this
school.
A
long time ago, my parents divorced so today I lived with my mother in
Paris. Causes some problems with my father, he want not to finance my
studies...
But
the life is expensive, my mother must to occupy of my two little
brothers and my grand sister. Actually, my sister go to business
school in Paris. But it's very expensive, thankfully she touchs the
scholarship.
As
my dream is from to university australian and return of my home
country, I would like to help my mother because I can't to realize my
dream, and to have the profession of my dream.
I
knows that many people are need of scholarship ,but my family needs
its too... The integration of this school can to change my life . I
can to find my grands parents, my origins, my culture and everything
that make to happy. I want to succeed my studients , find my
profession of my dream and for allow my mother to revive this
parents.
I
would love to have this scholarship for realize my dream... So
seriously ,I apply you this opportunity.
Thanks,
goodbye
